games.chess

Class Game

  • java.lang.Object
    • joueur.BaseGame
      • games.chess.Game

  • public class Game
extends joueur.BaseGame
    The traditional 8x8 chess board with pieces.

    • Field Summary

      Fields 
      Modifier and Type Field and Description
      Player currentPlayer
      The player whose turn it is currently.
      int currentTurn
      The current turn number, starting at 0 for the first player's turn.
      java.lang.String fen
      Forsyth–Edwards Notation, a notation that describes the game board.
      int maxTurns
      The maximum number of turns before the game will automatically end.
      java.util.List<Move> moves
      The list of Moves that have occurred, in order.
      java.util.List<Piece> pieces
      All the uncaptured Pieces in the game.
      java.util.List<Player> players
      List of all the players in the game.
      java.lang.String session
      A unique identifier for the game instance that is being played.
      int turnsToDraw
      How many turns until the game ends because no pawn has moved and no Piece has been taken.

        gameObjects, name

    • Method Summary

      • Methods inherited from class java.lang.Object

        equals, getClass, hashCode, notify, notifyAll, toString, wait, wait, wait

    • Field Detail

      • currentPlayer

        public Player currentPlayer
        The player whose turn it is currently. That player can send commands. Other players cannot.

      • currentTurn

        public int currentTurn
        The current turn number, starting at 0 for the first player's turn.

      • fen

        public java.lang.String fen
        Forsyth–Edwards Notation, a notation that describes the game board.

      • maxTurns

        public int maxTurns
        The maximum number of turns before the game will automatically end.

      • moves

        public java.util.List<Move> moves
        The list of Moves that have occurred, in order.

      • pieces

        public java.util.List<Piece> pieces
        All the uncaptured Pieces in the game.

      • players

        public java.util.List<Player> players
        List of all the players in the game.

      • session

        public java.lang.String session
        A unique identifier for the game instance that is being played.

      • turnsToDraw

        public int turnsToDraw
        How many turns until the game ends because no pawn has moved and no Piece has been taken.
